ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Yes, and you will be among those brought near.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yes," said he, "you will be among the honoured."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh replied: 'Certainly, and you shall be among those who are near to me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh replied, "In addition to your rewards, you will become my close friends thereafter."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Yes, and moreover you will (in that case) be of the nearest (to me)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Yes, and you shall certainly be of those who are near (to me).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Yes, indeed; and you shall be among the near-stationed.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He answered: Yes, and surely ye shall be of those brought near (to me).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh replied, "Certainly, and you shall also become my courtiers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: yea! and verily ye shall be of those brought nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Of course! And indeed you shall be among those near [to me].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Yes, and moreover you will (in that case) be of the nearest (to me)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yes' he answered, 'and you will be among those near'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Yes, and you will be among my favorites.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Yes, and, [moreover], you will be among those made near [to me]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:114] He said, ‘Yes, and indeed you shall be of those brought near’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He answered: Yea) you have that, (and surely ye shall be of those brought near (to me)) in status.
